title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NoneIntroduction to soft computing: Neural Networks, Fuzzy Sets, Genetic Algorithm, Rough sets and Probabilistic reasoning. Applications of soft computing in pattern recognition, control systems and image processing. Hybrid systems - Applications of Fuzzy -neural, Neuro-evolutionary and Rough-fuzzyneural approaches. Knowledge discovery in databases â Data mining and web mining using soft computing techniques. Soft computing approaches to information systems project management.
